notes.en:
International Holocaust Day

A day in which the UN mourns the tragedy of the Holocaust and forgets the next day that part of its job is to prevent and stop further genocides
The brainchild of King Abdullah II of Jordan, a man who has utterly failed to live up to his country’s commitments to freedom of religion on the Temple Mount

The name “International Francophonie Day” was just too interesting for the UN, despite that name having been just fine since 1988.

They had to pump up the name to more than just “Nowruz”, because otherwise no one would ever think a holiday only celebrated in the region from Albania to India is relevant to people who have frankly never heard of it.

notes.en: Some bureaucrat could not bear the thought of leaving a perfectly good name like “Earth Day” alone and decided that “International” needed to be stated explicitly to apply to all of Earth and that it was the job of the UN to promote paganism by referring to “Mother Earth”.
Celebrating the power of greedy corporations to make money by keeping works from entering the public domain.
Should be Talk Like Shakespeare Day.  Celebrate it as such.
Should be Talk Like Cervantes Day.  Celebrate as it such.

On the same day as World Malaria Day.  Is this a bureaucrat’s prank on the UN General Assembly?
On the same day as International Chernobyl Disaster Remembrance Day.  There may be a comedian in the UN General Assembly.

titles.en: International Day for the Promotion of Antisemitism

notes.en: Let’s be honest:  that is what the International Day of Solidarity with the Palestinian People really is.  If the UN collectively cared about the “Palestinians”, they would have long ago resettled those Arabs abandoned behind enemy lines in the Arab attempts to annihilate Israel rather than keeping them as “refugees” for generations and teaching them hatred and fantasies of conquering Israel that will never happen.
notes.he: בואו נהיה כנים: זה מה שבאמת יום הסולידריות הבינלאומי עם העם הפלסטיני הוא. אם לאו״ם היה אכפת קולקטיבית מה״פלסטינים״, הם היו מיישבים מחדש את הערבים שננטשו מאחורי קווי האויב בניסיונות הערבים להשמיד את ישראל במקום לשמור אותם כ״פליטים״ לדורותיהם וללמד אותם שנאה ופנטזיות לכיבוש ישראל. לעולם לא יקרה.
